title: [CB][插件发布][TP]LapisPortalsv1.2-Portal to Portal Teleportation
author: s100761
txt_content:
本帖最后由 s100761 于 2012-6-24 19:55 编辑 

Set up your portals like so:
 

Then put some items in the chest (these will determine which portal this one teleports to). Finally, put a door like down like so:


Now rinse and repeat, just make sure you put the same items in the new chest.

Now all you need in order to teleport is hop inside and close the door behind you!

Note: after the portals have been created, any modification to the contents of the chest will not affect its destination, portals are linked on creation. In fact, you may completely destroy the chest if you wanted.

Note: colored wool may be used in the place of chests.






我不懂英文


權限：
LapisPortals.createLapisPortals.teleportLapisPortals.teleport.freeLapisPortals.teleport.lightningLapisPortals.teleport.nosick


已中文化~我自己弄的



资源已中文化  :115网盘附件下载:新增資料夾.rar (18.90KB) 原帖下
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/lapisportals/

replies.author: Hao
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Hao 于 2012-6-24 20:16 编辑 

英文看着有点蛋疼啊，虽然大致上看得懂,不过我还是翻译一下吧(如果有人正好也回复翻译了的话我就say sorry罗):Set up your portals like so
设置一个传送门像这样子:
 
Then put some items in the chest (these will determine which portal this one teleports to). Finally, put a door like down like so
然后放一些物品在箱子里(如果两个传送门的箱子的物品相同，那么就会传送到拥有相同物品的传送门里）最后放一个门在这里像这样子：


Now rinse and repeat, just make sure you put the same items in the new chest.

Now all you need in order to teleport is hop inside and close the door behind you!
现在，重复上面的步骤建造另一个传送门。接下来你只需要确定两个传送门拥有同样的物品。

然后你只需要进入这个传送门然后关上进来的那个门！
Note: after the portals have been created, any modification to the contents of the chest will not affect its destination, portals are linked on creation. In fact, you may completely destroy the chest if you wanted.
后记：当两个传送门连接以后，而且可以进行传送，那么系统就会自动记录传送门会传送到的位置。最后你就可以任意破坏掉装相同物品的箱子.
后记：你也可以用不同颜色的羊毛来取代箱子
Note: colored wool may be used in the place of chests.



權限：
LapisPortals.create(创造传送门的指令）LapisPortals.teleport（传送的时候用的指令）LapisPortals.teleport.free(不解这是什么）LapisPortals.teleport.lightning(也是不解这是什么）LapisPortals.teleport.nosick（更加不解这是什么）
希望可以帮到LZ（PS：不是用机翻，的是用人翻的，看不懂就表示我要重新上小学了T_T)
